Title: roundDown
Description: Accepts a number and rounds it down to an element in the specified array. If the value is less than the lowest bound, the lowest bound is returned.
num: A number to round down. Numeric.arr: Array of elements to round age down to. Array of UInt/Float type.
Number rounded down to an element in arr. If the value is less than the lowest bound, the lowest bound is returned. UInt/Float type deduced from the type of arr.
Examples: SELECT *, roundDown(*, [3, 4, 5]) FROM system.numbers WHERE number IN (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
